pages.use_cases__executives_page__banner__titl: Empower Your Executive Decisions with MaxAI
pages.use_cases__executives_page__banner__desc: Unleash the power of AI for insightful market analysis and streamlined communication. MaxAI equips business leaders with cutting-edge tools for smarter, faster decision-making and business growth.
pages.use_cases__executives_page__description_: MaxAI transforms how you interact with information. From AI-powered search optimization to real-time market insights, MaxAI ensures you're always ahead of the curve. Our suite of tools is designed to provide executives and business owners with a competitive edge in market research, decision-making and strategic planning.

Transform the way you handle real estate tasks with MaxAI. With MaxAI, time-consuming tasks become a thing of the past. Streamline your workload, from client communications to market research, with our AI-driven solutions. pages.use_cases__tech_page__banner__descriptio: Unlock new horizons in engineering and technical documentation with MaxAI. Designed to streamline your workflow, our Chrome Extension aids in efficient documentation, innovative solution development, and improves communication accuracy. Experience the power of AI in every aspect of your technical tasks.
pages.use_cases__tech_page__description__conte: MaxAI isn't just a tool; it's your engineering partner. From better interaction with documentation tasks to enhancing your research capabilities with AI-powered searches, MaxAI is engineered to multiply your productivity and accuracy tenfold.
pages.use_cases__tech_page__abilities_1__conte: Highlight and use AI tools with a mini menu on text selections in the browser. Customize prompts for speeding up repetitive tasks.

modules.footer__desc: The fastest way to use personalized 1-click AI anywhere to save hours every day. Powered by ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and more.
modules.plan_features_table__set_up_your_own_pro: Use your own prompts to speed up repetitive tasks as you work.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt__tooltip_de: As fast as ChatGPT Plus. No country restrictions. Powered by gpt-3.5-turbo.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt_4__tooltip_: OpenAI's most capable model, great at tasks that require creativity and advanced reasoning.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt_16k__toolti: Enhanced version of ChatGPT with 4x context window than its predecessors.
modules.plan_features_table__claude__tooltip_des: Anthropic's fastest model, 100K context window, great for very long document and code analysis, summarization, and comprehension.
modules.plan_features_table__claude_2__tooltip_d: Anthropic's 2nd iteration of model for enhanced capabilities, 100K context window, great for tasks ranging from sophisticated dialogue and creative content generation to detailed instruction.
modules.plan_features_table__gemini_tooltip_desc: Google's most capable and general model. Built from the ground up for multimodality. Gemini on MaxAI is currently in the beta phase, supporting only text and code, will soon add support for images, videos, and audio.
modules.plan_features_table__summarize_chat_with: Chat with AI about any webpages: The AI understands the page context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
Chat with AI about any Youtube videos: The AI understands the video context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
modules.plan_features_table__ai_powered_search__: Query or search as you would in Google, and let our AI automatically refine queries, sift through search results, and deliver concise answers by combining and inferring answers from multiple sources for you.
modules.plan_features_table__search_with_AI__too: Enhance your Google search: Let AI combine and infer answers directly from search results, offering you clear insights without browsing through each link yourself.
modules.plan_features_table__summarize_chat_with: Chat with AI about any PDF files: The AI understands the file context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
Chat with AI about any email threads: The AI understands the file context, allows you to get summaries, ask specific questions, and delve into details seamlessly.
modules.plan_features_table__pdf_ai_viewer__tool: Interact with PDFs by chatting with AI: Get summaries, ask questions, and seamlessly access context-rich information.
modules.plan_features_table__gmail_writing_assis: Let AI generate entire email drafts and replies for you in seconds, and perfect your Gmail draft & reply in one click.
modules.plan_features_table__facebook_writing_as: Enhance your Facebook posts and replies with AI-driven drafts and suggestions, ensuring your content resonates with your Facebook followers.
modules.plan_features_table__linkedIn_writing_as: Boost your LinkedIn professional interactions using AI-enhanced, context-sensitive drafts and rapid responses.
modules.plan_features_table__xtwitter_writing_as: Craft compelling tweets or reply to posts with instant AI-generated content tailored for your needs on X/Twitter.
modules.plan_features_table__youtube_writing_ass: Quickly reply to comments using AI-assisted drafts in your YouTube Studio, making channel management more efficient!
modules.plan_features_table__outlook_writing_ass: Let AI generate entire email drafts and replies for you in seconds, and perfect your Outlook draft & reply in one click.
modules.plan_features_table__instagram_writing_a: Enhance your posts and replies with AI-driven drafts and suggestions, ensuring your Instagram content resonates with your followers.
modules.plan_features_table__one_click_prompts__: Turn your hours-long everyday tasks into minutes with our expanding collection of ready-to-use prompts.
modules.plan_features_table__ai_response_languag: Set AI to always reply in your chosen language.
modules.plan_features_table__chatgpt_temperature: Control AI response randomness. A lower temperature makes AI responses less random, more deterministic, and repetitive.
modules.plan_features_table__web_access_copilot_: Get answers to the hardest questions with comprehensive web insights.
modules.plan_features_table__web_access_advanced: Choose from the world's top search engines, get more search results, specify search time range and region, and select AI response language with Web Access.
modules.faq_list__question1__desc: The basic features of MaxAI are free, including a daily limit on AI requests. For access to advanced features, an upgrade is required.
modules.faq_list__question2__title: How do I cancel my paid plan?
modules.faq_list__question2__desc2: and click 'Manage my subscription' to cancel your subscription.
modules.faq_list__question3__title: Do the model request limits of the paid plan apply to my own API key?
modules.faq_list__question3__desc: No, these usage limits are specific to models like GPT-4 that are directly operated by MaxAI. If you're on a paid plan and using your own API key, you can use any models linked with it without any usage limits set by MaxAI. For more details on usage limits, please see our
modules.faq_list__question4__desc: You can use MaxAI.me on any website on any Chromium-based browsers (like Chrome and Edge) to compose, improve writing, summarize, explain, fix spelling & grammar, translate, or reply to any text.
modules.faq_list__disclaimer_part1: By subscribing, you are enrolling in automatic payments. Cancel or manage your subscription through Stripe's customer portal from "My Plan". All services are delivered according to the
modules.faq_list__disclaimer_part2: you confirm with your sign-up. Please note that this service is for human, normal use only. You may not share the account with other people or use programmatic methods to access the service, bypassing the official user interface. In the event that violations of the Terms of Service result in financial or other damages, we reserve the right to pursue legal action and seek appropriate compensation.

affiliate.hero_section__description__part1: Join our affiliate program and earn
affiliate.how_it_works__step1__description: <0>Sign up</0> for the affiliate program and get your exclusive affiliate link.
affiliate.how_it_works__step2__description: Share your unique link with your audience and track the performance in real-time via <1>Rewardful</1>.
affiliate.how_it_works__step3__description: Earn <1>25%</1> recurring commission through the first year of each new subscriber that you refer to MaxAI!
affiliate.call_to_action__title: Join the program and start earning
affiliate.faq__sub_title: Answers to common questions. Can't find what you're looking for? Email us at
affiliate.faq__question1__title: Is there a max payout cap?
affiliate.faq__question1__description__part1: There is no limit to your payout potential.
affiliate.faq__question1__description__part2: As you gain more subscribers, your earnings will increase!
affiliate.faq__question2__title: Which currency do you pay in?
affiliate.faq__question2__description: We will pay you in USD $.
affiliate.faq__question3__description__part1: We can pay you via PayPal.
affiliate.faq__question3__description__part2: If PayPal doesn't work for you, simply let us know what works best for you.
affiliate.faq__question4__description__part1: Payments will be tracked and sent to all affiliates on the 15th of each month.
affiliate.faq__question4__description__part2: It may take a few days to process the payment, so please give it 3-5 days to see the funds hit your account.
affiliate.faq__question5__title: How can I track my referral performance?
affiliate.faq__question5__description__part1: You can log into your affiliate account on
affiliate.faq__question6__description: Your social media channels, blogs, social groups, mailing list, web apps, mobile apps, or anywhere you believe MaxAI may benefit the audiences.
affiliate.faq__question7__title: Can I promote my affiliate link with paid advertising?
affiliate.faq__question7__description__part1: You may not use your affiliate link in any paid advertising or paid media. This includes search engine ads, Facebook ads, TikTok ads, or anything similar that would compete with MaxAI's marketing and cause confusion for potential customers.
affiliate.faq__question7__description__part2: Abuse, gaming, and policy violations will result in having your account banned and any existing and future commissions forfeited.

features_landing.youtube_summary_pages__description: One click to obtain YouTube video summaries, engage in conversations with video, and gain valuable insights.
features_landing.youtube_summary_pages__section1__descrip: MaxAI's 1-click Video Summarizer allows you to generate concise summaries of any YouTube video with just one click. Save time and quickly grasp the main points and key takeaways without watching the entire video.
features_landing.youtube_summary_pages__section2__descrip: Enhance your video comprehension with MaxAI's interactive chat feature. After generating the summary, you can engage in a conversation with the video, asking follow-up questions, seeking clarification, or exploring related topics. MaxAI will provide insightful responses, helping you gain a deeper understanding of the subject matter.
features_landing.chat_pdf_pages__description: Extract details and obtain answers from large PDF files such as manuals, essays, and books.
features_landing.chat_pdf_pages__section1__description: MaxAI.me revolutionizes the way you interact with your PDF files. Simply drag and drop any PDF into your browser, and let our advanced AI technology do the rest. MaxAI.me intelligently analyzes the content, extracting key information and generating concise summaries, allowing you to grasp the essence of the document in a matter of seconds.
features_landing.chat_pdf_pages__section2__description: Take your PDF exploration to the next level with MaxAI.me's interactive chat feature. Ask questions related to the content, and our AI-powered chatbot will provide accurate and relevant answers based on the information within the PDF. Whether you need clarification on a specific topic or want to dive deeper into a particular section, MaxAI.me is your go-to companion for a truly immersive PDF experience.
features_landing.translate_pages__description: Smart context-aware translations in multiple languages, powered by the best AI models like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini.
features_landing.translate_pages__section1__description__: Revolutionize your translation experience with MaxAI.me. With just a simple text selection and a click of the translate button, you'll receive instant, high-quality translations that rival professional translators.
MaxAI.me leverages the power of advanced AI models like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini to deliver accurate, context-aware translations, ensuring you get the best results every time.
features_landing.translate_pages__section2__description__: MaxAI.me goes beyond traditional translation tools by providing an immersive, side-by-side reading experience for users who need to reference both the original and translated content simultaneously.
This neat and clear presentation allows for easy comparison and comprehension, enhancing your bilingual reading experience.
features_landing.vision_pages__description: Effortlessly extract text from any image, ask questions and get instant answers, solve complex math problems, and gain deep insights through comprehensive AI image analysis power. Experience a whole new level of image understanding and interaction, all within the seamless MaxAI.me browser extension.
features_landing.vision_pages__section1__title: Unlock the Power of AI Vision
features_landing.vision_pages__section1__description__par: Revolutionize the way you interact with images using MaxAI.me's cutting-edge AI Vision power. With just a few clicks, you can extract text, ask questions, solve problems, and gain valuable insights from any image on your screen or uploaded from your local device.
Simply select an area on your screen, take a snapshot, or upload an image, and let MaxAI.me's advanced AI Vision power do the rest. Experience a whole new level of image understanding and analysis.
features_landing.vision_pages__section2__description: Say goodbye to manual typing and transcription. MaxAI.me's AI Vision power allows you to extract text from any image with unparalleled accuracy. Whether it's a screenshot, a local image, or a photo containing text, MaxAI.me's AI Vision can quickly and efficiently recognize and extract the text for you.
features_landing.vision_pages__section3__title: Ask Questions and Get Instant Answers
features_landing.vision_pages__section3__description: Have you ever looked at an image and wondered about its contents? With MaxAI.me's AI Vision, you can now ask questions about any image and receive instant, accurate answers. Whether you're curious about an object, a person, or a specific detail within the image, simply ask your question, and MaxAI.me will provide you with the information you need.
features_landing.more_over_section__description__part1: MaxAI.me is more than just a translation tool – It's your all-in-one AI-powered browser extension. With MaxAI.me, you can access a wide range of AI-driven features right in your browser, on any website you visit.
features_landing.more_over_section__description__part2: From writing assistance and webpage summarization to ChatPDF and AI painting, MaxAI.me empowers you to read, write, and create with the help of the most advanced AI models, including ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini. Upgrade your browsing experience and unlock your productivity potential with MaxAI.me today!
